name: Spin Tracks
description:
Spin Tracks is a idea I came up with when I heard the theme was spin. Building this game was super fun. Lots of time and energy went into this. I hope you enjoy! I am a drummer and so I loaded 3 songs from my band Infinity at the time now we are called Clairvoyant Rebellion. This is the third time I've done a game jam. The first time I've done it alone. I'm taking a Video Game Development and Design course at Toronto Film School. I hope to get my diploma by June. Looking for a job in the industry. Wish me luck and e-mail me to talk or if you have any questions.

Chills, André Chrétien
